state.code:
flowchart TD
    Vehicle("Vehicle")
    User("Vehicle User")

    subgraph System["GHAVeT System"]
        calc["Automatic Toll Calculation"]
        auth["Payment Authorization"]
        barrier["Barrier Activation (Optional)"]
        record["Transaction Recording"]
        confirm["Post-Passage Confirmation"]
        receipt["Send Receipt"]
    end

    subgraph App["User App"]
        deposit["Deposit Funds (Mobile Money or Visa)"]
        balance["Check Balance"]
        apply["Apply for Tags"]
        status["Check Application Status"]
        history["View Transaction History"]
        statement["Download Statement"]
        receive["Receive Receipt"]
    end

    Vehicle --> |"Approaches Toll Plaza"| calc
    calc --> auth
    auth --> barrier
    barrier --> record
    record --> confirm
    confirm --> receipt
    receipt --> receive

    User --> |"Deposit Funds"| deposit
    User --> |"Check Balance"| balance
    User --> |"Apply for Tags"| apply
    User --> |"Check Application Status"| status
    User --> |"View Transaction History"| history
    User --> |"Download Statement"| statement
    receive --> |"Display Receipt"| User

    receive --> |"Send Receipt"| receipt

graph LR subgraph E_Tolling_System Vehicle_Owners["Vehicle Owners
* Drives vehicles"] -.-> RFID_Tags["RFID Tags"] RFID_Readers["RFID Readers"] -.-> RFID_Tags RFID_Readers -.-> Toll_Agencies["Toll Agencies"] Payment_Gateways["Payment Gateways"] -.-> Toll_Agencies Government_Authorities["Government Authorities
* Manages Toll Agencies"] -.-> Toll_Agencies Service_Providers["Service Providers
* Offer services related to E-Tolling"] -.-> Toll_Agencies Data_Centers["Data Centers
* Stores and processes E-Tolling transactions data"] -.-> Toll_Agencies Security_Systems["Security Systems
* Ensures security of E-Tolling transactions and data"] -.-> Toll_Agencies Maintenance_Teams["Maintenance Teams
* Responsible for upkeep of RFID infrastructure"] -.-> RFID_Readers end

graph LR
    subgraph E_Tolling_System
        Vehicle_Owners["Vehicle Owners"] -.-> RFID_Tags["RFID Tags"]
        RFID_Readers["RFID Readers"] -.-> RFID_Tags
        RFID_Readers -.-> Toll_Agencies["Toll Agencies"]
        Payment_Gateways["Payment Gateways"] -.-> Toll_Agencies
        Government_Authorities["Government Authorities"] -.-> Toll_Agencies
        Service_Providers["Service Providers"] -.-> Toll_Agencies
        Data_Centers["Data Centers"] -.-> Toll_Agencies
        Security_Systems["Security Systems"] -.-> Toll_Agencies
        Maintenance_Teams["Maintenance Teams"] -.-> RFID_Readers
    end
